name: Marcato Desire
desc:
Art can save those drowning in life. Mortals gather together, music of different emotions collide, and the drying graffiti on the wall speaks of a thousand unique forms of agency.
Now, turn up the music until the soundwaves crash the Hollow. Even if Ethereals don't have ears, let's make them feel the power of humanity!
desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: Gather 'round, mortals! Turn up the music!
